query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZCST604 ( MANDT, CS604_YEAR, CS604_US, CS604_NS, CS604_NB, CS604_NC, CS604_PK, CS604_NS_P, CS604_NC_P, ERDAT, ERZZT, ERNAM ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, #CS604_YEAR#, #CS604_US#, #CS604_NS#, #CS604_NB#, #CS604_NC#, #CS604_PK#, #CS604_NS_P#, #CS604_NC_P#, HEX(CURRENT DATE), HEX(CURRENT TIME), #G_USER_ID# )
